sub_title: Senior Business Consultant bij BearingPoint / Algemeen bestuurslid Scouting Nederland
summary:
Senior business consultant in the data management and IT domains with experience in the financial- and (semi-)public sector. Used to work with board level stakeholders and in enterprise environments, Joris easily makes the connections across different organisational domains. 

Besides his work as consultant, Joris has experience in various board- and supervisory roles.

profile_positions.description:
Senior Business Consultant helping organizations become data centric through strengthening data governance & -management.

- Product Owner/Project Management Support (insurance; private sector): responsible to coordinate system-integrations as part of of a large (300 people) programme aimed at onboarding new types of business.
- Data governance consultant (re-insurance, private sector): supporting a Risk Management department in the design & set-up of a Business Architecture team, formulating their data strategy and implementing solutions for data management.
- Trainer: Development of training curricula & training delivery. Setting-up a firm -wide Agile curriculum.
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Business consultant focussing on the application of the possibilities of IT to reach business goals. 

Roles:
- Data governance consultant (insurance, private sector): data strategy definition & roadmap design
- Consultant organizational design (utilities, semi-public sector): efficiency assessment of planning department for maintanance personell. 
- Data governance consultant (banking, private sector): rationalisation of procured information portfolio & improvement of data procurement office.
- Data governance consultant (knowledge institute, semi-public sector): data strategy definition and roadmap design.
- IT Program assessor (various organization, non-profit sector): assessing IT-related programs & provide recommendations for them to improve.
- HR consultant: (re)design of on- & offboarding and recruitment processes and supporting materials. Development of training curricula.
profile_positions.title: IT Business Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Scouting Nederland is the largest youth organization in the Netherlands with 70000 (youth) members and 40000 volunteers. 
The national board is responsible for preparing and realization of the organizations’ policies, managing its assets and maintaining connections with the world Scouting organizations.

Current focus areas:
- Legal affairs
- Volunteer recognition

Past focus areas:
- Volunteer development
profile_positions.title: Board Member

profile_positions.description:
Trainee at the supervisory board of Bpf Bouw. 
Focus area:
- Data management in times of transitions
profile_positions.title: Stagiair Raad van Toezicht

profile_positions.description:
Developing innovative solutions in the field of learning & development in the public & private sector. Working together with start-ups, corporate clients and governmental agencies to develop new, innovative business opportunities and new partnerships.

Roles
- PPM consultant; setting-up Project & Program Management structure of a strategic initiative.
- Staffer; matching needs with available consultants.
- Business Consultant; lead consultant, coaching professionals and structuring the activities of a PMO.
- Junior Architect; developing the business architecture for a new service aimed at innovating the business model of Capgemini.
- Scrum master; coaching an innovation team to develop a new service offering.
- Bid team lead; led a bid team for the development of a learning & development platform.
- Member work counsel; designing a new appraisal method for Capgemini NL. Renewed the Young Professional Masterclass of the largest Capgemini NL division.
- Global Subject Matter Expert in the field of learning & development. Sharing insightful articles, doing interviews and blogging on the topics of learning &. innovation.
- IT strategy consultant; defining the IT strategy for various clients in the public and private sector.
- Project manager; responsible for running pilots with mobile technology in various learning settings.
- Agile/Scrum trainer; delivering Scrum Master & Scrum Product Owner courses.
- Assistant project manager; supporting the daily activities of a project in the field of mobile technology. Setting-up a start-up in a corporate environment.
profile_positions.title: Business Technology Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Roles
- Learning & development consultant; advising on the development of corporate e-learning modules.
- Business analyst; analyst in a mobile technology project responsible for product development.
profile_positions.title: Junior Business Technology Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Developing innovative learning & development solutions.

Roles:
- Busines process consultant; advising on the use of IT solutions to improve the item development proces.
- Educational designer; developing training materials . 
- Educational consultant; developing  blended learning courses. Training subject matter experts in the use of an LMS.

Elected, full-time board member of student association Daedalus (550 members).
Responsible for budgetting (yearly budget of € 25 000), financial accountability, purchases & sales and automation.
Simplified sales administration by automating the sale of books and drawing materials.

Subject Matter Expert in the field of certification development.

volunteer_experiences.role: Regional Ambassador SIS Executive Program Leaders Council
volunteer_experiences.description:
Ambassador for the Social Impact Strategy (SIS) Executive Program of the University of Pennsylvania's School of Social Policy & Practice in the Europe region. Task involved:
- Responding to questions from prospective students of the SIS program.
- Doing consultancy work for current students and alumni that own or work at startups in the field of education.

volunteer_experiences.role: Student representative Library and Information Science
volunteer_experiences.description:
Elected student representative in the educational committee.
Improved the reporting of course evaluations to students.

Providing advice and developing solutions to raise awareness of the European Union with young people in relation to the elections of the European Parliament  of May 2014. Delivering guest lectures on the structure of the European Union which reached a total of 1200 young people.

company.name: World Organization of the Scout Movement (WOSM)

volunteer_experiences.description: The World Organization of the Scout Movement (WOSM) was looking for a stronger external image in the field of recognition of prior learning. In his role of external representative, Joris was responsible for disseminating the position of the WOSM at the European institutions. To achieve this, he took part in seminars where he talked to Members of the European Parliament to inform them on the work of the WOSM. As a result of his activities, the visibility of the WOSM on a European level increased.
Preparing and providing pedagogical activities for 200 disabled young people during a one day event.

volunteer_experiences.role: Project officer project Recognition of Learning in Scouting and Guiding (ROLIS)

company.name: World Organization of the Scout Movement (WOSM)

volunteer_experiences.description: Planning of and participating in international meetings of 8 national scout organizations. My specific responsibilities included website maintenance, creating media impressions of the various meetings, communication with participating organisations and writing the final report (as part of a team).

Developing the position of CNV Jongeren on labour related themes (labour law, educational budgets and flex-work).
Conducting strategic analyses regarding the organization's strategy.

Member financial auditing committee (2018 – 2020)
Performing the yearly financial audit of a local scouting group.

Consultant Assessment & Qualification (2011 – 2013)
Development of a guide and workshop about assessing volunteers for Scouting trainers.

Youth Leader (Beavers) (2011 – present)
Organising pedagogical activities in a local group (Scouting Salwega, Utrecht) for 10 – 20 children aged 5 – 7 for 2 hours a week. Activities were based on the Scout method.

Regional trainer (2011 – 2014)
Delivering of weekend long training activities for new leaders in Scouting.

Head Programme Office Scouting Academy (2011 - 2012)
Head of the communication department of Scouting Academy, one of the four main pillars of Scouting in the Netherlands. Responsible for the communication of Scouting Academy to regions and local group in a team of four volunteers. Activities included team formation and creating brochure, newsletters and support documents.

Member national project team Scouting Academy (2010 – 2011)
Developing promotional materials for Scouting Academy to be used internally. My contribution resulted in a steady output of new promotion materials aiding the implementation of the educational programme in the Dutch Scout organization.

HRM Lead RoverscoutMania (2010 – 2011)
Responsible for recruitment and selection of approximately 100 volunteers for a two day Scouting event.

Member activities committee (2009)
Organising non-study related events for members of study association Daedalus.

Emergency responder (2008 – 2010)
Responsible for evacuation and first-aid during emergencies of events organised by study association Daedalus.
